constantValues: Selection rule that allows the scheduling engine to select a number of resources from a pool of resources. The rules can be associated with a service.

members.name: resourceSpecId

constantValues: Unique identifier of the resource specification.

members.description: Unique identifier of the resource specification.

members.name: createdOn

constantValues: Date and time when the resource specification was created.

members.description: Date and time when the resource specification was created.

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who created the resource specification.

members.name: modifiedOn

constantValues: Date and time when the resource specification was last modified.

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the resource specification.

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the resourcespec.

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the resourcespec.

constantValues: Unique identifier of the business unit with which the resource specification is associated.

members.name: importSequenceNumber

constantValues: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

members.name: overriddenCreatedOn

constantValues: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

members.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode

constantValues: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

members.name: constraints

constantValues: Additional constraints, specified as expressions, which are used to filter a set of valid resources.

members.description: Additional constraints, specified as expressions, which are used to filter a set of valid resources.

members.name: description

constantValues: Selection rule that allows the scheduling engine to select a number of resources from a pool of resources. The rules can be associated with a service.

members.description: Selection rule that allows the scheduling engine to select a number of resources from a pool of resources. The rules can be associated with a service.

members.name: effortRequired

constantValues: Number that specifies the minimal effort required from resources.

members.description: Number that specifies the minimal effort required from resources.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Unique identifier of the scheduling group with which the resource specification is associated.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Unique identifier of the scheduling group with which the resource specification is associated.

members.name: objectiveExpression

constantValues: Search strategy to use for the resource specification.

members.description: Search strategy to use for the resource specification.

members.name: objectTypeCode

constantValues: Type of entity with which the resource specification is associated.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Unique identifier of the organization with which the resource specification is associated.

members.name: requiredCount

constantValues: Required number of resources that must be available. Use -1 to indicate all resources.

members.description: Required number of resources that must be available. Use -1 to indicate all resources.

members.name: sameSite

constantValues: Value that specifies that all valid and available resources must be in the same site.

members.description: Value that specifies that all valid and available resources must be in the same site.

definitions.description: Selection rule that allows the scheduling engine to select a number of resources from a pool of resources. The rules can be associated with a service.
